feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Initial Commit - My new website!
entry.content: Welcome to my website! I decided to play around with Jekyll’s static website repository and made this website. I have no clue where this website is headed, but I hope to update it with random stuff, ‘cause why not regularly? GitHub hosts this for free! I could contribute to the internet with random facts about myself!
